title: Frank Novinec from Hatebreed
itunes:title: Frank Novinec from Hatebreed
description:
Recently I was able to have a chat with the prolific guitarist Frank "3 Gun" Novinec from Hatebreed about consistency, the origins of the Cleveland hardcore scene and responsibility. It was a revealing and honest chat that I am proud to share with you. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
